title: Add reference architecture review document and investigate applying rules to existing reference architectures
description:
Add the 'Review Guidelines for Reference Architectures.md' document to the cncf/tab repository and investigate how these review guidelines can be applied to existing reference architectures in cncf/architecture.

Context:
- Review guidelines document is in root: 'Review Guidelines for Reference Architectures.md'
- These guidelines will be used to review submissions to cncf/architecture
- Current process documented in: process/reference-architectures.md
- Existing architectures: adobe, allianz (in cncf/architecture repo)

Tasks:
1. Add review guidelines document to cncf/tab repo (proper location TBD)
2. Review existing reference architectures against new guidelines
3. Determine if/how to apply guidelines retroactively
4. Consider if guidelines should be referenced in process/reference-architectures.md
